column4: ravi_: as far as i can see (looking at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/LucidUpgrades) you have to upgrade to 9.10 first
oh, couple of days ago, in this channel, I asked how to upgrade my commandline server from ubuntu 8.04 to new, and ppl said - wait, and directly upgrade to 10.04.. uhh,
you can upgrade from 8.04 since its LTS, but 9.04 isn't so you cant that way
